packages.name: Base Nodes
packages.description: Essential foundational nodes providing core functionality for data processing, flow control, and basic operations.

packages.name: Apple
packages.description: Automate macOS Calendar, Notes, Messages, Reminders, Dictionary, screenshots and system TTS.

packages.name: HuggingFace
packages.description: Use a growing list of HuggingFace models from categories like vision, audio, classification, segmentation and more.

packages.name: Audio
packages.description: Add nodes for audio processing: synthesize, effects, cut, mix, looping, reverb, pitch-shift, FM synthesis.

packages.name: Data
packages.description: Add data validators and transformers that reshape, clean and join data for ML and visualization.

packages.name: File
packages.description: Add nodes to extract text, tables and images from PDFs, Excel, Word or Markdown; re-format spreadsheets and convert docs with Pandoc or PyMuPDF.

packages.name: Image
packages.description: Add nodes for image processing: filters (blur, sharpen, invert), generate SVGs, slice/merge grids.

packages.name: ML
packages.description: Add nodes for scikit-learn and statsmodels: estimators, classification, clustering, regression.

packages.name: Replicate
packages.description: Add a growing list of replicate nodes for text, audio, image, video using the replicate API.

packages.name: Fal
packages.description: Access FAL's lightning-fast generative endpoints (AnyLLM, text-to-image/video, TTS, STT).

packages.name: AIME
packages.description: Add AIME API nodes for image, audio, text and translation tasks.

packages.name: ElevenLabs
packages.description: Generate lifelike speech in 30+ languages from text using ElevenLabs.
